biotools.summary: Automated microarray quantification program based on feature detection by wavelet packet decomposition analysis. The algorithm handles rotated images (up to 45°), spot detection, meta-gridding separation, gridding, background correction, and spot irregularities.

bioschemas.name: WaveRead
bioschemas.summary: Automated microarray quantification program based on feature detection by wavelet packet decomposition analysis. The algorithm handles rotated images (up to 45°), spot detection, meta-gridding separation, gridding, background correction, and spot irregularities.
